constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: NEIPOL Name: MC1  Maldens and Coombe
AAS Name: Settlement - Old Malden (1st recorded 1086)
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

description: Details required for Conditions 7 (SUDs), 9 (Biodiversity Enhancements (Details)), 10 (Landscaping), 11 (Waste and Recycling), 12 (Cycle Parking) and 14 (Construction Management Plan) of planning permission 23/03155/FUL (Variation of Condition Application under Section 73A of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to carry out development without compliance with Condition 1 (Approved Plans) of planning permission 22/02399/FUL (Demolition of existing dwelling and erection of 2no. three-storey semidetached dwellings) to allow changes in top floor)
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: The applicant has submitted insufficient information to satisfy the requirements of Condition 7 (SUDs). Therefore, the proposal would fail to prevent the risk of flooding to and from the site in accordance with policy SI13 of the London Plan 2021, the Sustainable Design and Construction SPG 2014, the Non-Statutory Technical Standards for Sustainable Drainage Systems 2015 and policy DM4 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

The applicant has submitted insufficient information to satisfy the requirements of Condition 10 (landscaping) and have therfore failed to ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, in accordance with policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

The applicant has submitted insufficient information to satisfy the requirements of Condition 14 (Construction Management Plan) In order to safeguard the amenities of the surrounding residential occupiers and in the interests of the safety and operation of the highway network, in accordance with policies T4 and T7 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS7, DM9 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
